backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data models (Product, Rep, Consignment, Sale, ReturnModel, Payout, SettlementPeriod, Adjustment) with CRUD operations, settlement period management with lock enforcement, and balance calculations for consignment tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of backend data models and persistent storage for products, reps, consignments, sales, returns, and payouts with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, utilities, and configuration covering the complete consignment management application with settlement periods and adjustments.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system using charcoal and green accent palette for light and dark themes, plus CSS custom properties for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the ConsignFlow application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (dashboard, products, reps, consignments, sales, returns, payouts, statements, settlement periods, adjustments) wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component with header, navigation tabs for all pages with icons, main content area, and footer with Caffeine.ai attribution and UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/CommissionSettin: Dialog component for configuring default commission rate and per-rep overrides with validation, saving to commission settings utility.
A popover component that provides start and end date inputs for filtering data by date range, with clear and apply actions.
An editor component for managing a list of line items with product selection, quantity, and optional unit price fields, supporting add and remove operations.
frontend/src/components/ProductSelect.ts: A select dropdown component that fetches and displays products from the backend, showing product name and price.
frontend/src/components/RepSelect.tsx: A select dropdown component that fetches and displays sales representatives from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for managing login state, identity, and authentication lifecycle using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including products, reps, consignments, sales, returns, payouts, adjustments, and settlement periods.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for theming (light/dark modes), and print-specific styles for statement rendering.
frontend/src/lib/calculations.ts: Provides functions to calculate rep balances (sales, returns, payouts, commission, amount owed) and inventory by rep, with optional date filtering and commission rate overrides.
frontend/src/lib/commissionSettings.ts: Manages commission settings stored in localStorage, including default commission percentage and per-rep overrides, with functions to get, save, and update settings.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Utility functions for generating CSV files from data arrays, downloading CSV files to the browser, and formatting dates and currency values.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Helper functions for working with month boundaries, formatting month/year strings, and getting the current month.
frontend/src/lib/settlementLock.ts: Checks if a given date falls within a closed settlement period and provides formatted error messages to prevent editing locked transactions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdjustmentsPage.tsx: Page for viewing and adding financial adjustments to rep accounts, with form validation, date selection, and a sortable table of existing adjustments.
frontend/src/pages/ConsignmentsPage.tsx: Page for managing consignments with multi-line item entry, date range filtering, CSV export, and settlement period lock validation to prevent editing closed periods.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard displaying rep balances and inventory in tabbed views, with date range filtering, CSV export, and commission settings configuration.
frontend/src/pages/PayoutsPage.tsx: Displays and manages commission payouts to sales reps with date filtering, CSV export, and settlement period locking. Allows adding new payouts with rep selection, amount, date, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Manages product catalog with search functionality and CSV export. Provides a dialog to add new products with name and price fields.
frontend/src/pages/RepsPage.tsx: Manages sales representatives with search and CSV export including commission rates. Provides a dialog to add new reps by name.
frontend/src/pages/ReturnsPage.tsx: Tracks product returns from reps with date filtering, CSV export, and settlement period locking. Supports multi-line item returns with rep, product, quantity, and date selection.
frontend/src/pages/SalesPage.tsx: Records sales transactions with date filtering, CSV export, and settlement period locking. Supports multi-line item sales with rep, product, quantity, unit price, and date selection.
frontend/src/pages/SettlementPeriodsPage: React page component for managing settlement periods with create/close functionality, displaying periods in a table with status badges, and using dialog forms for creating new periods with start/end date validation.
frontend/src/pages/StatementsPage.tsx: React page component for generating printable monthly statements per rep, allowing selection of rep/year/month and displaying sales, returns, payouts with commission calculations and balance summaries.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH, typography, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for the ConsignFlow UI theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking ConsignFlow's architecture, features, and roadmap including core consignment management, settlement periods, onboarding, identity-based analytics, and UI personalization features across versions 1 and 2.
